name: Sudden Strike 3
description: Experience the hit World War 2 real-time strategy game for the first time in full 3D glory, expanding on all strategic and tactical options. Command joint operations of naval, land-based and airborne units on the largest maps in the series.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP 32-bit Processor: Intel or AMD 2Ghz Dual-Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c hardware compatible, 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
